DataElement.preferredName: Estimate Pulmonary Artery Systolic Pressure Measurement  Millimeter of Mercury Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numeric millimeters of mercury value measured, assigned or computed related to the assessment of the estimated pulmonary artery systolic pressure measurement.

Concepts.definition: The blood pressure in the pulmonary artery during the contraction of the left ventricle of the heart.
A non-SI unit of pressure equal to 133,332 Pa or 1.316E10-3 standard atmosphere. Use of this unit is generally deprecated by ISO and IUPAC.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
